paragraphs: In the season of life in which I passed through the Rain's Hand, more than 90 duels did I face to prove myself invincible. I learned the 38 grips, the 750 offensive and 1800 defensive stances, and the 9000 strikes that I would practice for all my future days.
With Onsi's blessing, the sword-singer must do the same to achieve Mastery of Discipline.
